meanings.definition: causing an unpleasant feeling of fear or unease
meanings.sent1: The dark, empty house had a creepy feeling that made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The movie had some creepy scenes that made me jump in my seat.
meanings.sent3: The creepy sound of the creaking door turned out to be just the cat playing around.
meanings.sent4: The creepy shadows in the forest seemed to dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The creepy atmosphere of the haunted house lingered long after we left.

meanings.definition: the quality of being strange or eerie
meanings.sent1: The creepiness of the old abandoned building gave me chills.
meanings.sent2: There was a certain creepiness to the foggy graveyard at night.
meanings.sent3: The creepiness of the clown's smile made the children giggle nervously.
meanings.sent4: The creepiness of the misty forest was like something out of a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The creepiness of the eerie painting seemed to follow you with its eyes.

meanings.definition: a feeling of discomfort or revulsion caused by something unsettling
meanings.sent1: The creepiness of the slimy creature made me want to run away.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned doll had a certain creepiness that made me uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The creepiness of the strange food made me hesitate before taking a bite.
meanings.sent4: The creepiness of the eerie music sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The creepiness of the unsettling painting made me feel like I was being watched.
